mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (user_idx, content, created_date, status, type, idx, template_idx) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{content}, NOW(), #{status}, #{type}, #{idx}, #{template_idx})
INSERT INTO approval_line (document_idx, user_idx, step, status, approved_date) VALUES (#{document_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{step}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM approval_line WHERE document_idx = #{document_idx} AND status != '승인' AND del_yn = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_log (document_idx, user_idx, status, comment, approved_date) VALUES (#{document_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{status}, #{comment}, #{approved_date})
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM document WHERE document_idx = #{document_idx}
SELECT MIN(step) FROM approval_line WHERE document_idx = #{document_idx} AND status = '미확인' AND del_yn = 0
SELECT al.*, u.user_name FROM approval_log al JOIN user u ON al.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE al.document_idx = #{document_idx} ORDER BY al.approved_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document_variable (document_idx, var_key, var_value, del_yn) VALUES (#{document_idx}, #{key}, #{value}, 0)
